content: Hello! 2 years ago I opened a ticket to get the apex domain working with AreWeWebYet. Recently, it has moved to the rust-lang org, and the domain's registrar has changed from Ghandi to AWS. I'm assuming that registrar switch means the domain is now managed by the rust team too. When the default domain is set to the www subdomain with GitHub Pages, the apex domain will not redirect properly (and vice-versa). The best solution would be adding a CNAME/ALIAS record (idk what AWS calls it) to the apex domain pointing towards the www subdomain. There's a bit more information at https://github.com/rust-lang/arewewebyet/issues/129#issuecomment-740371721.
we can setup a http redirect from the apex to www
awesome! that would allow https://arewewebyet.org to finally not give an https error page :)
@chip setting up the redirect
@chip should be up now

Thanks for your help! I've closed the issue. I checked real quick to see if any of the other arewe_yet sites on the rust-lang org are affected, but the only other one is the async one which doesn't default to/have the www subdomain
